Package gov.nih.nlm.ling.io

Class XMLReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.io.XMLReader
  • public class XMLReader
extends java.lang.Object
    A reader to parse syntactic/semantic content of a Document from an XML file. The XML file is expected to conform to the format used for the BioNLP shared task, below. 
     
 	<document id="D1">
 		<text>Involvement ... (rest of the document)</text>
 		<sentence id="S1" charOffset="0-100">
 			<text>Involvement ... (rest of the sentence)</text>
 			<tokens tokenizer="" parser="">
 				<token id="S1T1" POS="NN" charOffset="0-11" text="Involvement" lemma="involvement"/>
 				... (Other tokens)
 			</tokens> 
 			<dependencies>
 				<dependency id="STD1" t1="S1T1" t2="S1T3" type="prep_of"/>
 				... (Other dependencies)
 			</dependencies>
 			<tree>(ROOT ...)</tree>
 		</sentence>
 		.... (Other sentences)
 		<Term id="T1" type="Protein" charOffset="37-50" headOffset="45-50" text="p70(s6)-kinase"/>
      ... (Other terms and assorted semantic items)
 </document>
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      XMLReader()
      Creates a new XMLDocumentReader with no readers.
      XMLReader​(java.util.List<XMLSemanticItemReader> readers)
      Creates a new XMLDocumentReader with the given XMLSemanticItemReaders.

      • load

        public Document load​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads the lexical/syntactic content from an XML file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the XML file name
        Returns:
        a Document object represented by the XML file, null if it can not be parsed

      • load

        public Document load​(java.lang.String fileName,
                     boolean parseSemantics,
                     java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItemFactory> sifClass,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem>,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> annotationTypes,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoreArgTypes)
        Loads the content from an XML file. It assumes the file contains one set of tokenization/parsing output. If parseSemantics is set to false, the annotationTypes variable has no effect.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the XML file name
        parseSemantics - whether to parse the semantic items
        sifClass - the semantic item factory class
        annotationTypes - a Map with the semantic class/type information to parse
        ignoreArgTypes - the argument types to ignore (for relations, events)
        Returns:
        a Document object represented by the XML file, null if it can not be parsed

      • load

        public Document load​(java.lang.String fileName,
                     SpanList spansToProcess,
                     boolean parseSemantics,
                     java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItemFactory> sifClass,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem>,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> annotationTypes,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoreArgTypes)
        Loads the content from an XML file. It assumes the file contains one set of tokenization/parsing output. If parseSemantics is set to false, the annotationTypes variable has no effect.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the XML file name
        spansToProcess - the span list specifying the zones to process
        parseSemantics - whether to parse the semantic items
        sifClass - the semantic item factory class
        annotationTypes - a Map with the semantic class/type information to parse
        ignoreArgTypes - the argument types to ignore (for relations, events)
        Returns:
        a Document object represented by the XML file, null if it can not be parsed

      • load

        public Document load​(java.lang.String fileName,
                     java.lang.String tokenizerName,
                     java.lang.String parserName,
                     boolean parseSemantics,
                     java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItemFactory> sifClass,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem>,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> annotationTypes,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoreArgTypes)
        Similar to #load(String, boolean, Class, Map, Set), but the tokenizer/parser output to use for further processing can be selected. tokenizerName is expected as the 'tokenizerName' attribute of the 'tokens' element. parserName is expected as the 'parserName' attribute of the 'tree' element.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the XML file name
        tokenizerName - the name of the tokenizer to use
        parserName - the name of the parser to use
        parseSemantics - whether to parse semantic objects
        sifClass - the semantic item factory class
        annotationTypes - the map of semantic class/types to parse
        ignoreArgTypes - the argument types to ignore (such as Cue)
        Returns:
        the Document representation, null if it can not be parsed

      • load

        public Document load​(java.lang.String fileName,
                     java.lang.String tokenizerName,
                     java.lang.String parserName,
                     boolean parseSemantics,
                     java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItemFactory> sifClass,
                     SpanList spansToProcess,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem>,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> annotationTypes,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoreArgTypes)
        Similar to #load(String, String, String, boolean, Class, String, Map, Set), but also the spans to process for semantics (i.e., zones) can be specified. The portions of the document outside the zones will be ignored for semantics.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the XML file name
        tokenizerName - the name of the tokenizer to use
        parserName - the name of the parser to use
        parseSemantics - whether to parse semantic objects
        sifClass - the semantic item factory class
        spansToProcess - the span list specifying the zones
        annotationTypes - the map of semantic class/types to parse
        ignoreArgTypes - the argument types to ignore (such as Cue)
        Returns:
        the Document representation, null if it can not be parsed

      • load

        public Document load​(java.lang.String fileName,
                     SpanList spansToProcess,
                     java.lang.String tokenizerName,
                     java.lang.String parserName,
                     SemanticItemFactory sif,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem>,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> annotationTypes,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoreArgTypes)
        Similar to #load(String, boolean, String, String, Map, List), but also the spans to process for semantics (i.e., zones) can be specified. The portions of the document outside the zones will be ignored for semantics.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the XML file name
        spansToProcess - the span list specifying the zones
        tokenizerName - the name of the tokenizer to use
        parserName - the name of the parser to use
        sif - the semantic item factory
        annotationTypes - the map of semantic class/types to parse
        ignoreArgTypes - the argument types to ignore (such as Cue)
        Returns:
        the Document representation, null if it can not be parsed

      • parseSemanticItems

        public void parseSemanticItems​(Document doc,
                               SpanList spansToProcess,
                               nu.xom.Element docEl,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem>,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> annotationTypes,
                               java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoreArgTypes)
        Parses the semantic objects indicated in the XML file. If the document will be partially parsed, offset and end variables need to indicate the character offsets of the part that will be parsed, otherwise 0. The Document is updated with the semantic items.
        Parameters:
        doc - the Document with the semantic objects
        spansToProcess - the span list specifying the zones, if the document will be partially parsed
        docEl - the XML element representing the individual Document content
        annotationTypes - the Map of semantic types to parse for each class
        ignoreArgTypes - the relation argument roles that should be ignored (such as Cue)

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] argv)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
